# calcite-shell-panel

The `calcite-shell-panel` component is a container used by [calcite-shell](../calcite-shell) for displaying information.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                    | Type      | Default |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `primary` | `primary` | When true, the panel is the primary panel for the application. | `boolean` | `false` |
